name: Squids
body:
# Welcome to Squids.
_Squids_ is a platform to help companies and individuals to search theirs photos independently of which software they are using.
Check out the code at http://github.com/squids/squids-web

## Phase Goals
### 1. EXIF Information
Just search based on EXIF information

### 2. GPS Information
Search based on EXIF Information including GPS

### 3. Faces
Search based on Faces

# Twitter
Follow the project at http://twitter.com/squidsapp

# Support or Contact
Contact info@squids.io and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

## IRC
Drop on freenode.net channel #squids-app
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
